attributes.action: Let Holistic therapies, yoga studios and gyms start working again.
attributes.additional_details:
Peoples well being isn’t being catered for holistic therapies yoga and gyms to name a few are good for peoples mental health so let them work
in the long run it may save lives and NHS resources by helping people feel good again in these trying times.
attributes.background: Let people in well being start back to work immediately

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has eased the restrictions on which businesses are required to close. The only businesses currently required to remain closed are:

- Nightclubs, dance halls, and discotheques
- Sexual entertainment venues and hostess bars

You can read more about reopening of different types of business here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/closing-certain-businesses-and-venues-in-england
